flavorText: Before signing anything on Grixis, always read the fine print.

foreignData.flavorText: グリクシスで何かに署名するには、まず契約に目を通すこと。
foreignData.name: 精神の誓約
foreignData.text: 対戦相手１人を対象とする。あなたのライブラリーの一番上からカードを３枚公開する。そのプレイヤーは、それらのカードをあなたの手札に加えることを選んでもよい。そうしないなら、それらのカードをあなたの墓地に置き、カードを５枚引く。

foreignData.flavorText: 在格利极，签署名字之前得先把小字全部看完。
foreignData.name: 心灵盟约
foreignData.text: 展示你牌库顶的三张牌。目标对手可以选择将这些牌置于你手上。如果他未如此作，则将这些牌置入你的坟墓场并抓五张牌。

name: Covenant of Minds
originalText: Reveal the top three cards of your library. Target opponent may choose to put those cards into your hand. If he or she doesn't, put those cards into your graveyard and draw five cards.

rulings.text: The targeted opponent has two options: Let you have the three revealed cards or let you have five unknown cards. Note that if the opponent goes with the first option, you put cards into your hand rather than draw them (in case something like Hoofprints of the Stag cares about that), but if the opponent goes with the second option, you actually draw cards.

text: Reveal the top three cards of your library. Target opponent may choose to put those cards into your hand. If they don't, put those cards into your graveyard and draw five cards.
